it.polimi.se2018.controller

Class RowVarietyScore

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.controller.PublicObjectiveScore
      • it.polimi.se2018.controller.ArrayVarietyScore
        • it.polimi.se2018.controller.RowVarietyScore

  • public class RowVarietyScore
extends ArrayVarietyScore
    The class to calculate the score related to the property of having all rows with different values for a certain property (value or colour).

    It extends the intermediate abstract class ArrayVarietyScore, which contains the method to check if a single row respects the required property.

    It's used for the cards 'Row Color Variety' and 'Row Color Variety'.

    Author:
    michelemarzollo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected int getScore(Cell[][] grid)
      The score is given by the number of rows on the grid that are complete, and that have all dice with all different values for a certain property, multiplied by the victoryPoints of the card.
